title: Implementing a Linked List in Solidity
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Write a Bank deposit contract to achieve the following functions:

1. Depositing directly to the Bank contract address through wallets like Metamask
2. Recording the deposit amount for each address in the Bank contract
3. Using an iterable linked list to store the top 10 users with deposit amounts


Please submit your github repository address.

description: Understanding how to use a linked list to optimize the Gas issue of maintaining an ordered array.
